content.description: Start with your right and left on two jugs in the middle of the rail running across the middle of the boulder. Go straight up to a good dish, and then pull all the way up to the toilet bowl sloper.  Get enough friction to top it out.
content.protection: A pad.  The landing is nice and flat.
content.location: This problem starts right in the middle of the face facing toward the creek bed.

content.description:
Start with both hands on an incut crimp on the far right of the rail system midway up the boulder's face.  Pull up with your right to a barely-there sloper and then gain a two-finger dish with your left.  Fight through the dirt that constantly pours down the top of the boulder for a slick and not very enjoyable top out.  The FA specified the topout to Infestation should be avoided to complete the true line.

If the problem were completely clean, this would be a pretty classic climb, but, as the way the boulder is situated on the hill makes that practically impossible, you may just find yourself annoyed at all the dirt causing you grief.
content.protection: A pad.  The landing is flat.
content.location: Start on the far right side of the face facing the creek bed.

content.description:
Start with hands on the far left of the rail system about half way up the face of the boulder.  Slap up right to a decent sloper and hope you have enough friction to get your left out to a good crimp.  Compress your right through some bad slopers as you continue to traverse left.

Eventually you should be able to throw over a big hump and feel for a glory hold jug ledge.  Once you've got the ledge, suddenly realize there are no feet, pause for a moment in confusion, then accept that a beached whale may be your only feasible option to finish.
content.protection: Pads and spotters, but emphasis on the spotters.  If you botch the awkward topout you could roll of the boulder below you into a 6-7 foot drop onto some not-so-nice turf.  Have someone make sure you don't roll off that rock.
content.location: The problem starts to the left of rail system on the Infestation boulder.
